name: Heroes of Delum
description: Heroes of Delum is a real-time strategy survival game. Fight against hordes of monsters on a randomly generated world, alone or up to 5 in multiplayer co-op! Collect resources, build defensive mazes, use weapons and magical abilities in a face off with the dark forces of Delum!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Dual Core at 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
